def_cn: （使）发出震颤（或碰撞）声;（使）发出格格声
def_en: When something rattles or when you rattle it, it makes short sharp knocking sounds because it is being shaken or it keeps hitting against something hard.
A rattle is a baby's toy with loose bits inside which make a noise when the baby shakes it.

def_cn: （在观看足球比赛或举行部落仪式中使用的）急响器，响板
def_en: A rattle is a wooden instrument that people shake to make a loud knocking noise at football matches or tribal ceremonies.

def_cn: （响尾蛇尾部的）角质环，响环
def_en: A rattlesnake's rattle is the hard part at the end of its tail which makes a rattling sound when it is shaken.
If something or someone rattles you, they make you nervous.

def_cn: （巴士、火车或汽车）哐啷哐啷地行进，轰隆隆地开过
def_en: You can say that a bus, train or car rattles somewhere when it moves noisily from one place to another.
